## Local Archive

All metadata, raw audio data, and data products are stored locally on the DON shared network drive (\\\\swc-storage4-s, MMTD-ACOUSTICS). This includes the following;

-   extracted SUD files (log, wav, accelerometer)
-   depth data
-   GPS data
-   QAQC results
-   decimated data
-   LTSAs
-   analysis data products

Compressed SUD files are stored locally to the PAM Synology drive.

Deployment metadata is also archived to a local [Tethys database](https://tethys.sdsu.edu/). Detailed directions to access this database [here](https://sael-swfsc.github.io/SAEL-lab-manual/content/Data-Archive-Tethys.html).

## NCEI

Raw audio data and deployment metadata are archived to [NCEI Passive Acoustic Data Archive](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/products/passive-acoustic-data). To allign with permitting requirements, data may be inaccessible to the public for up to two years after the data collection date. 

Link to archived data once uploaded.

## PACM

Once finalized, beaked whale and sperm whale detections will be archived to [NEFSC Passive Acoustic Cetacean Map](https://apps-nefsc.fisheries.noaa.gov/pacm/#/)

Link to archived data once uploaded.
